formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, sum(i=k..n, binomial(n,i)*(stirling1(i,k)*k^(n-i)*(-1)^(n-i)))), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else sum(sum(binomial(n,i)*(stirling1(i,k)*k^(n-i)*(-1)^(n-i)),i,k,n),k,1,n); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
